metadata.title: CVE-2020-15888 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Lua through 5.4.0 mishandles the interaction between stack resizes andgarbage collection, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow, heap-basedbuffer over-read, or use-after-free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15888` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
